name: @dsabre/generate-vue-cli
description: A Vue CLI to generate components instantly

scripts.build: npx tsc && npx esbuild dist/generate-vue-cli.js --minify --outfile=dist/generate-vue-cli.js --allow-overwrite && echo -n "#!/usr/bin/env node\n"|cat - dist/generate-vue-cli.js > dist/tmp.js && rm -f dist/generate-vue-cli.js && mv dist/tmp.js dist/generate-vue-cli.js

author: Daniele Sabre (https://github.com/dsabre)
